comment: DeepWiki MCP server: Provides documentation search tools for GitHub repositories via ask_question, read_wiki_structure, and read_wiki_contents. Uses a custom filtering transport to work around MCP SDK bug #636 (https://github.com/modelcontextprotocol/go-sdk/issues/636) where the SDK fails to handle SSE ping events. The filteringTransport in manager.go strips out non-'message' events before they reach the SDK.
